verses.name: Luke 9:51
verses.text: And it came to pass, when the time was come that he should be received up, he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem,

verses.name: Luke 9:52
verses.text: And sent messengers before his face: and they went, and entered into a village of the Samaritans, to make ready for him.

verses.name: Luke 9:53
verses.text: And they did not receive him, because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem.

verses.name: Luke 9:54
verses.text: And when his disciples James and John saw this, they said, Lord, wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven, and consume them, even as Elias did?
